SamPy.astronomy.blackholes.MassesHaeringRix¶

SamPy.astronomy.blackholes.MassesHaeringRix()¶

The full data file contains: Galaxy Type mbherrp mbherrm mbhexp Ref sigma

Returns:bulge mass, black hole mass, ellipticals, spirals, S0s
Return type:a list
